title: Luxurious Community Near Rivermark Plaza
posting_body: The Carlyle Apartments in Santa Clara, CA
An elegant resort and prestigious community, rich with amenities designed to enhance your pleasure.

Features like crystal waterfalls, a sparkling pool, soothing spas, a state-of-the-art fitness center, residences of unparalleled quality, and services of unequaled sophistication, including advanced high speed Internet access.
This is not a mere vacation paradise; this is your HOME.
Here, you can relax and enjoy a community designed to bring a new dimension of satisfaction and sophistication to your life.
Every imaginable detail has been addressed, ensuring all your needs are met with gracious efficiency.
A discerning rental community that takes residential living to new heights.
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1208 Sq.
- High Speed Internet Available at Clubhouse
Pet Friendly, contact office for details
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
